TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {134029=28 July 2015, 213108=Edelweiss is in the Finance - General sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 5,015.48 crore. The company management includes Rashesh Shah - Chairman & M.D & CEO, Venkat Ramaswamy - Executive Director, Himanshu Kaji - Executive Director, Rujan Panjwani - Executive Director, Vidya Shah - Non Executive Director, P N Venkatachalam - Independent Director, Sunil Mitra - Independent Director, Berjis Desai - Independent Director, Sanjiv Misra - Independent Director, Kunnasagaran Chinniah - Independent Director, Biswamohan Mahapatra - Independent Director, Navtej S Nandra - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532922 and the NSE with an NSE Code of EDELWEISS. Its Registered office is at Edelweiss House, Off. C.S.T. Road,,Kalina Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400098. Their Registrars are Link Intime India Pvt. Ltd., 135247=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 211803=Astec LifeSciences Recommended on Mar 31st 2015, 134540=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut}
